Content: i want to start a new modded playthrough but i can't think of what mods to add
caves are so fucking b o r i n g
they need to have some s p i c e added to them
caves need some spicyness added to them to make it so that they aren't so uninteresting to explore
i don't even want new ores_ just some variation in blocks in the caves would be nice_ and new underground structures similar to (don't kill me) Terraria would definitely make caving less of a slog
basically it makes crafting banners not the worst thing in the world to try and remember
